docker.name: RUN
docker.args: apk add --no-cache gnupg pwgen nodejs npm binutils &&     npm install -g foxx-cli &&     rm -rf /root/.npm
docker.raw: RUN apk add --no-cache gnupg pwgen nodejs npm binutils &&     npm install -g foxx-cli &&     rm -rf /root/.npm

docker.name: RUN
docker.args: cd /tmp                                &&     wget ${ARANGO_SIGNATURE_URL}           &&     wget ${ARANGO_PACKAGE_URL}             &&     gpg --verify ${ARANGO_PACKAGE}.asc     &&     ar x ${ARANGO_PACKAGE} data.tar.gz     &&     tar -C / -x -z -f data.tar.gz          &&     sed -ri         -e 's!127\.0\.0\.1!0.0.0.0!g'         -e 's!^(file\s*=).*!\1 -!'         -e 's!^\s*uid\s*=.*!!'         /etc/arangodb3/arangod.conf        &&     echo chgrp 0 /var/lib/arangodb3 /var/lib/arangodb3-apps &&     echo chmod 775 /var/lib/arangodb3 /var/lib/arangodb3-apps &&     rm -f ${ARANGO_PACKAGE}* data.tar.gz
docker.raw: RUN cd /tmp                                &&     wget ${ARANGO_SIGNATURE_URL}           &&     wget ${ARANGO_PACKAGE_URL}             &&     gpg --verify ${ARANGO_PACKAGE}.asc     &&     ar x ${ARANGO_PACKAGE} data.tar.gz     &&     tar -C / -x -z -f data.tar.gz          &&     sed -ri         -e 's!127\.0\.0\.1!0.0.0.0!g'         -e 's!^(file\s*=).*!\1 -!'         -e 's!^\s*uid\s*=.*!!'         /etc/arangodb3/arangod.conf        &&     echo chgrp 0 /var/lib/arangodb3 /var/lib/arangodb3-apps &&     echo chmod 775 /var/lib/arangodb3 /var/lib/arangodb3-apps &&     rm -f ${ARANGO_PACKAGE}* data.tar.gz
